artist: Architect: McKim, Mead, and White; Architect: Charles Follen McKim; Architect: William Rutherford Mead; Architect: Stanford White
inscription: Inscribed in pencil, LC: SIDE ELEVATION OF PROPOSED BUILIDNG / MINNEAPOLIS MUSEUM OF FINE ARTS; in pencil, LL: McKIM, MEAD AND WHITE, ARCHTS / 160 FIFTH AVE., NEW YORK; in pencil, LR: SCALE 1/8 = 1'0 / MARCH 18, 1912
medium: Graphite on paper, mounted on board
provenance: McKim, Mead, and White, New York (architectural firm); presented to MIA, 1912.
title: Side Elevation of Present Building, Minneapolis Museum of Fine Arts
